description: This file defines the AppRouter class which manages route definitions and navigation helper methods for a Flutter app. It includes route mappings for the main notes list, note editor, and settings screens, as well as methods to navigate to the editor and settings screens.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A utility class that holds route definitions and navigation methods for the application.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: A getter that returns a map of route strings to widget builders for navigation.

methods.name: toEditor
methods.description: Navigation helper method to push the note editor screen, optionally with a specific note ID.

methods.name: toSettings
methods.description: Navigation helper method to push the settings screen.
